thread.title: Megan Williamson

author: Megan Williamson
title: Megan Williamson
text: I have a boxer benji who has severe allergies. A friend recommended tails as it has a hypoallergenic option for food. This is brilliant as you can choose what ingredients go into your dogs food... all at a very reasonable price! Delivered all to my door every month as well... so no last minute rush to the shop when he's out of food! Brilliant idea would recommend to everyone!
